verbose_text: Deng et al used HBV-DNA-positive serum to culture human renal tubular epithelial cells in vitro and found that HBV-DNA induced cell apoptosis, and the cell apoptosis ratio was positively related to the HBV-DNA level.
evidence: al                          used HBV-DNA-positive serum to culture human renal tubular epithelial cells in vitro and found that HBV-DNA induced cell apoptosis
